actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to permit withdrawal and release of certain documents, papers, or other information with regard to Drug Enforcement Administration employees.

summary.text: Authorizes the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to provide the Drug Enforcement Administration with any information in its possession relevant to alleged illegal activities of agents of the Drug Enforcement Administration.

titles.title: A resolution to permit withdrawal and release of certain documents, papers, or other information with regard to Drug Enforcement Administration employees.
